objectives.title: WASM Math Kernel
objectives.description: Port gf256.js logic to WASM/AssemblyScript for SIMD parallelization.

objectives.title: Adaptive Concurrency
objectives.description: Unified hardware-aware scaling across all engine modules.
objectives.goal: Automatic core saturation across all platforms.

objectives.title: UDP Transport Layer
objectives.description: Replace simulation with real node:dgram UDP/IP transport.
objectives.goal: Stable P2P transmission over localhost and LAN.

objectives.title: Dynamic MTU Discovery (M5)
objectives.description: Active probing of the network path to determine fragmentation limits.
objectives.goal: Determine largest safe PIECE_SIZE without OS-level fragmentation.

objectives.title: Elastic Symbol Resizing (M5)
objectives.description: Real-time bucketing of data based on current MTU discovery.
objectives.goal: Pivot symbol sizes mid-session to maximize bandwidth utilization.

objectives.title: Congestion-Aware Density (M5)
objectives.description: Adaptive tuning of symbol frequency vs size based on buffer telemetry.
objectives.goal: Prevent self-congestion and NIC buffer overflows.
